content: The client is a company that offers a range of products and services, with a focus on the insurance and telecom industries. They have a small marketing team and have recently implemented HubSpot and are in the process of implementing 6sense. They are also evaluating content experience platforms, such as Uberflip and Folloze. The client is interested in a demand generation strategy and execution to help drive more opportunities and RFPs, as well as support for their upsell initiatives for existing clients. They have a budget of $50k-$60k for the rest of this year and $100k for next year for an agency to help with these efforts. They are hoping to make a decision on the content experience platform by the end of the year.
